page.title: Stoichiometry Tab
page.introduction: On selection of a reactant or product line in the reaction diagram (only for non rule-based models), the stoichiometry properties panel appears below and can be. used to edit the stoichiometric coefficient. The default setting is 1.
page.operations: Edit the stoichiometric coefficient in the text field. Only positive integers are allowed; all other values are silently discarded.
